review: I waited over a month to get the Amazon Fire Stick because it sold out on Black Friday in less than 2 hrs at BestBuy. The review looked great but there was no mention of not supporting users outside the USA. I have a second home south of the border in Baja Caliornia near the beach and wanted to use the Amazon Stick with the family instead of having to deal with DISH TV satellite provider. After contacting Amazon customer support and troubleshooting the error the CS IT informed me that Amazon only supports USA IP addresses. No mention of Canada?

review: I bought this for a xmas gift for my boyfriend.  He hadn't even heard about it yet... thankfully not paying attention to the commercials! lol  After I bought it I talked with a few of my techie friends and was not happy with what I heard... but I have to say I'm pleasantly surprised!  This thing has made my life so much easier... I was gonna have to call the cable company to come out and run a line to the kitchen and this solved that problem.  The glitchieness that I thought I would experience I'm not... it runs flawlessly!  I love this thing so much I'm planning on dumping the expensive cable provider and going with this and Plex.tv as my whole house solution!  I'm so excited I really can't stand it!!!
